Title: Puzzle
Writer: Polly Mann (screenplay by), Oren Moverman (screenplay by), Natalia Smirnoff (based on the Argentinian film "Rompecabezas" by)
Actors: Kelly Macdonald, David Denman, Daniel Stewart Sherman, Austin Abrams
Plot: Agnes, taken for granted as a suburban mother, discovers a passion for solving jigsaw puzzles which unexpectedly draws her into a new world - where her life unfolds in ways she could never have imagined.
